import React, { useState } from 'react' import { MDBContainer,MDBRow,MDBCol,MDBCard,MDBCardBody,MDBIcon,MDBCardHeader,MDBCardTitle } from "mdbreact"; function ForgotPassword() { const [ formData, setFormdata ] = useState({ username: '', password1: '', password: '', }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const config = { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', } } } catch ( error ) { console.log(error.response) } } return ( Forgot Password
onSubmit(e)}>
setFormdata({...formData, username: e.target.value})} className="form-control form-control-alternative" placeholder="Enter your username" />
setFormdata({...formData, password1: e.target.value})} className="form-control form-control-alternative" placeholder="Enter new password" />
setFormdata({...formData, password2: e.target.value})} className="form-control form-control-alternative" placeholder="Confirm new password" />
) } export default ForgotPassword
